snippet.title: Game & Watch - Donkey Kong Circus (c)1984 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This is Nintendo's Donkey Kong Circus, part of the Game & Watch series.  This is another that was emulated a while back, but I didn't put a video for it up at the time.  As always thanks to Algestam and co. for the emulation.  This and the Panorama version of Mickey Mouse share the exact same ROM code, and I've use the same input recording to demonstrate both of them.  Amusingly Nintendo mixed up the external part codes for these, giving Donkey Kong Circus the "MK-96" code and Micky Mouse "DC-95"

Game & Watch artwork for MAME was done by DarthMarino (more recently emulated units) and hydef (units emulated before 2020)
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
